text: Get 1 large 3 topping pizza for 9.99 Or, at Jorden's get a large with Anything on it for $11.49, or get two medium, two topping pizzas for $12 plus tax at Dominoes. Its All GOOD.

text: They have really improved. My pizza and wings are always perfect and they always give great service. The delivery drivers are also fast and professional. Remember people..tip your drivers!

The pizzas are good, but the wait time during peak hours is much longer than the estimate.

text: The pizza with the wings are always on point. No complaints about the food are the service and if they screw your order up they always give us a free pizza to correct their mistakes. So having a good manager really goes along way.

text: Bruh......my pizza was 15 slices...my pizza was cut so many times it was 15 slices of thin pieces....plus my bill was 8.99 but I was charged almost 17 dollars for pickup. If depression was a food item, this pizza I received would be it.
